Package org.webcurator.core.harvester.agent

Interface Summary
FileFilter  
HarvestAgent The HarvestAgent is the interface used by the HarvestCoordinator to control the HarvestAgent and its individual Harvesters.
HarvestAgentConfig The config parameters for the harvest agent
HarvestAgentFactory Interface for a factory to create instances of a HarvestAgent.
Harvester The Harvester interface must be implemented for classes that wrap a specific Harvester implementation.
 

Class Summary
AbstractHarvestAgent The AbstractHarvestAgent implements the methods from HarvestAgent that can be implemented genericly for all Harvest Agent implementations.
AndFileFilter  
ExactNameFilter  
ExtensionFileFilter  
HarvestAgentFactoryImpl Factory to create HarvestAgent instances that use SOAP to communicate with a remote HarvestAgent
HarvestAgentHeritrix This is an Implementation of the HarvestAgent interface that uses Heritrix as the engine to perform the harvesting of the web sites.
HarvestAgentSOAPClient An implementation of the HarvestAgent Interface using SOAP to communicate with the HarvestAgent
HarvestAgentSOAPService The HarvestAgentSOAPService is the class that is accessed by the remote Web Service client.
HarvesterHeritrix The HarvesterHeritrix is an implementation of the harvester interface that uses Heritrix as the engine to perform the harvest.
HarvesterListener The HarvesterListener is registered to listen to Heritrix events so that it can perform tasks on certain state changes.
HarvesterStatusUtil This utility class has methods for rendering harvester status information in a human readable format.
NegateFilter  
NotEmptyFileFilter
